description: Updates a business glossary term in Amazon DataZone.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain in which a business glossary term is to be updated.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the business glossary term that is to be updated.

parameters.name: termRelations
parameters.description: The term relations to be updated as part of the UpdateGlossaryTerm action. classifies (list) --- The classifies of the term relations. (string) --- isA (list) --- The isA property of the term relations. (string) ---

nested_params.name: classifies
nested_params.description: The classifies of the term relations.

nested_params.name: isA
nested_params.description: The isA property of the term relations.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain in which a business glossary term is to be updated.

nested_items.name: glossaryId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the business glossary in which a term is to be updated.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the business glossary term that is to be updated.

nested_items.name: longDescription
nested_items.description: The long description to be updated as part of the UpdateGlossaryTerm action.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name to be updated as part of the UpdateGlossaryTerm action.

nested_items.name: shortDescription
nested_items.description: The short description to be updated as part of the UpdateGlossaryTerm action.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status to be updated as part of the UpdateGlossaryTerm action.

nested_items.name: termRelations
nested_items.description: The term relations to be updated as part of the UpdateGlossaryTerm action.

nested_items.name: classifies
nested_items.description: The classifies of the term relations.

nested_items.name: isA
nested_items.description: The isA property of the term relations.
